com.example.ARmirrorS.Server.Utils

Class ServerGUISetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ARmirrorS.Server.Utils.ServerGUISetup

  • public class ServerGUISetup
extends Object

    Class ServerGUISetup

    Class ServerGUISetup used to handle all related server User Interface for all image subtraction processing algorithms, and data collection.

    Mainly is used for setting up all sliders/seek bars and switches as well as radio groups and buttons for methods.

    Since:
    2019-12-05
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Yussuf Khalil, Daniel King, ykhalil2@illinois.edu, dking32@illinois.edu
    See Also:
    ImageProcessParam, Frame, SeekBar, Switch, RadioGroup, Activity

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(int position,
                Frame frame)
        Method handels: 1. Setup Chunk View 2. Setup Radio Button for subtraction Mode. 3. Setup SeekBar Listeners callback functions to monitor user input-progress.

        Parameters:
        position - Spinner position which matches the Subtraction Algorithm ID's.
        frame - currently being processed frame.

      • setupChunk

        private void setupChunk(int position)
        Inflate the chunks based on requested subtraction processing algorithm.
        Parameters:
        position - Spinner position which matches the Subtraction Algorithm ID's.

      • setupRadioButtons

        private void setupRadioButtons(int position,
                               Frame frame)
        Responsible for setting up All radioGroups and buttons for all processing methods. It registers all onClick listeners as well.
        Parameters:
        position - Spinner position which matches the Subtraction Algorithm ID's.
        frame - currently being processed frame.

      • setupSeekBars

        private void setupSeekBars(int position,
                           Frame frame)
        Responsible for setting up seek bars and switches for all processing methods. It registers all onClick listeners as well.
        Parameters:
        position - Spinner position which matches the Subtraction Algorithm ID's.
